code: import{ADD_TO_CART,REMOVE_FROM_CART,SUB_QUANTITY,ADD_QUANTITY,EMPTY_CART}from'./actionTypes';export var addToCart=function addToCart(id){return{type:ADD_TO_CART,id:id};};export var removeFromCart=function removeFromCart(id){return{type:REMOVE_FROM_CART,id:id};};export var subtractQuantity=function subtractQuantity(id){return{type:SUB_QUANTITY,id:id};};export var addQuantity=function addQuantity(id){return{type:ADD_QUANTITY,id:id};};export var emptyCart=function emptyCart(){return{type:EMPTY_CART};};
